summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting electrical overhead and underground distribution easements over portions of Section 3, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M.; Section 34, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M.; White Center West; Cedar Park; Section 6, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M.; Northend Country Estates; Bryon Mawr; Fremont Avenue Tracts No. 2; Section 32, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M.; as described below and placing said easements under the jurisdiction of the City Light Department.
